name: Last Shot VR for Cardboard
description:
The moon base has been ravaged by the Thing. You are the last survivor not under the Things mind control. It taunts you and wants you do kill your own friends. The Thing will try to decieve you to killing your own friends. Watch how it changes, and save yourself, your friends, and destroy the Thing.

Made at VRJam2016 by :

Christopher LoBello @trenchphysics

Benjamin Azan @BenAzan

Kevin Kovack
